name: Holy Mole
description:
Title: Holy Mole

Platform: Online

Genre: Text Adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 8+, casual gamers

Game Overview: This game places you in a normal morning outside of San Fransisco... or is it normal?? The player will go through a series of choices to determine their fate. Do you listen when your pets tell you something?

Instructions:Download the print to play instructions for more information

Game Design Team:  Andrew Storey – Game Designer
